Logs¶

26 March 2018¶

Initial Setup:

  1. Created Bitbucket repository - livecrowd-faq
  2. Created virtualenv
mkvirtualenv livecrowd-faq
  1. Upgraded pip
pip install -U pip
  1. Installed Django | Django version: Django-2.0.3
pip install Django
  1. Installed psycopg2 | required for working with postgresql ( http://initd.org/psycopg/download/ )
pip install psycopg2
  1. Added .gitignore with cheatsheet from here: ( https://gist.github.com/octocat/9257657 )

27 March 2018¶

  1. Created a config folder in the root repository
  2. Added init.py in the config folder and created a settings folder insite the config folder.
  3. Added url.py inside config folder
  4. Added Sphinx Documentation ( http://www.sphinx-doc.org/en/master/ )
pip install sphinx
  1. Installed sphinx_rtd_theme (https://pypi.python.org/pypi/sphinx_rtd_theme)
  2. Created /docs folder
  3. Created the docs with sphinx quickstart. everytime a change happens in the docs: go to the makefile (/docs) folder and do:
make html
